page: EE60005: Renewable And Distributed Energy Systems

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Renewable and Distributed Energy SystemsSyllabus•Introduction, •Energy economics, planning, auditing•Terminology and introduction to Renewable energy sources and Distributed Generation•Renewable energy sources- SPV, STEC, Wind, Tidal, Wave, Geothermal, OTEC, FC system •Distributed Generation-General, DG plant, Future (Microgrid) architecture •SPV system design- Stand alone and Grid connected system•Microgrid- Concept, Impact, management, economics, market participation
